item.title: Energy Efficiency at Imperial – How Green Are We?
item.author: Sebastian Gosden,
item.description: Imperial is a big organisation. Fifteen thousand students, six thousand members of staff, nine campus areas and a billion pound annual budget. By account of its sheer size, the College consumes a great deal of resources: energy, plastics, water, lavatory paper, and it all stacks up. Fortunately, …
